name: Speaker Verification
title: Speaker Verification
description: PresentID Speaker verification API checks whether two voices belong to the same  person or not. This capability is potentially useful in call centers.

endpoints.name: Send voice with voice file
endpoints.description:
Speaker verification API checks whether two voices belong to one person or not 

The voice must be between three seconds and one minute
The voices must not exceed 5 MB
Supported file types: wav, mp3, m4a, FLAC, aac, ogg

endpoints.name: Send voice with Voice URL
endpoints.description:
Speaker verification API checks whether two voices belong to one person or not.

The voice must be between three seconds and one minute
The voices must not exceed 5 MB
Supported file types: wav, mp3, m4a, FLAC, aac, ogg

endpoints.name: Send voice with Base64
endpoints.description:
Speaker verification API checks whether two voices belong to one person or not 

The voice must be between three seconds and one minute
The voices must not exceed 5 MB
Supported file types: wav, mp3, m4a, FLAC, aac, ogg
